'''Pernicious Proliferating Organism''' is a special enemy encountered during Phase 2 of the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] Weekly Boss.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|dendro_res=50%|hp_ratio=2|hp_type=2|atk_ratio=1|atk_type=2|hide_notes=1}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Pernicious Proliferating Organism
|name_1 = Self-Destruct
|desc_1 = Once it spawns, immediately starts rolling towards the Heart of Oasis. Once it reaches the Heart of Oasis, explodes after a delay, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}} and reducing the cleansing progress by '''14%'''. However, if a Pernicious Proliferating Organism is killed by the player, all party members will recover 20 [[Energy]].
}}
